newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Ayala Land, pension fund in land project.
newsitem.headline: Ayala Land, pension fund in land project.

text.p: MANILA, Dec 24 (Ruter) - Real estate firm Ayala Land Inc said on Tuesday it had entered into a joint venture with public pension fund Government Service Insurance System (GSIS) to jointly develop a three-hectare (7.5-acre) plot of land in suburban Quezon city.

"The agreement shall be effective upon obtaining the approval of the local government of Quezon city for the re-zoning of the property for commercial use," the company told the Philippine Stock Exchange.
Ayala will hold a 55 percent equity stake in the new company.
